SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM(SELECT b.eve_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(b.title,'<','<'),'>','>') title,
b.hit, b.eve_date, b.mem_num, m.mem_id FROM event b JOIN member m ON b.mem_num=m.mem_num ORDER BY b.eve_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
